definition: to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
Pervez Musharraf (1943-), Pakistani general and politician, president 2001-2008

sentences.english: Iberico ham, fine herbs croutons, Mediterranean Caesar dressing.
sentences.chinese: 伊比利亚火腿，香草面包丁，地中海沙拉汁。

sentences.english: Yes, I'll have a mixed Salad and a Sirloin Steak.
sentences.chinese: 我要一份综合沙拉和一客沙朗牛排。

sentences.english: Don't forget the salad forks and the placemats.
sentences.chinese: 别忘了沙拉叉和餐具垫喔。

sentences.english: White bean cannelloni salad with red, green, and yellow peppers with tomato concasse.
sentences.chinese: 白豆碎肉沙拉伴红椒，绿椒和黄椒，番茄碎。

sentences.english: Use hard-boiled eggs to make deviled eggs or egg salad sandwiches.
sentences.chinese: 吃魔鬼蛋或者鸡蛋沙拉三明治的话要用全熟鸡蛋。

sentences.english: Fett's armor and body were extremely battered by his ordeal in the Sarlacc.
sentences.chinese: 在沙拉克中的煎熬使费特的盔甲和身躯都饱受摧残。

sentences.english: Sarah and Ginna are two students discussing the merits of different styles of examination.
sentences.chinese: 学生沙拉和吉娜正在讨论不同形式的考试的优点。

sentences.english: A salad and soup makes a nice light lunch.
sentences.chinese: 一份沙拉和汤就是很好的简便午餐。

sentences.english: They are supporting just one leader, General Pervez Musharraf.
sentences.chinese: 它只支持一个领导人，那就是穆沙拉夫将军。

sentences.english: Park it on the kitchen table while you’re chopping salad.
sentences.chinese: 当你在切沙拉时把它放到厨房的桌子上。

sentences.english: Some people like to start their dinner with a salad of lettuce or other leafy greens.
sentences.chinese: 有人喜欢晚餐前吃盘莴苣沙拉或其它绿叶蔬菜沙拉。

sentences.english: Some people like to start their dinner with a salad of lettuce or other leafy greens.
sentences.chinese: 有人喜欢晚餐前吃盘莴苣沙拉或其它绿叶蔬菜沙拉。

sentences.english: I'd like to something light, the baked chicken and a side of potato salade .
sentences.chinese: 我要一些口味清淡的，熏鸡和一碟土豆沙拉。

sentences.english: Mrs. Wu will have the filet mignon with baked potato and Caesar salad.
sentences.chinese: 吴太太要小牛排，加烤马铃薯和凯撒沙拉。

sentences.english: I sometimes eat fruit salad as supper.
sentences.chinese: 我有时候把水果沙拉当做我的晚餐。

definition: pasta (abbr. for 意大利麵|意大利面[Yi4 da4 li4 mian4])/(Tw) yi mein, a variety of Cantonese egg noodle
rice in gravy, typically with meat and vegetables
